p: During the recent Ebola outbreak, an unprecedented number of HCWs were infected ( Fischer et al., 2014; Unprecedented number of m, 2014) and survivors of infectious diseases have higher rates of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) ( Hong et al., 2009). Recommendations around the use of psychological first aid (PFA) have been made by global authorities ( Psychological first aid d, 2014). However, the efficacy of this strategy is not well studied and barriers to its application exist ( Workforce development at, 2003; Birkhead and Vermeulen, 2018).
